description:
runtime: gdb support, fix pretty printing of channels.

The type to cast the elements to was stolen from a field
that's no longer there.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=db1d6ab48c40 ***

runtime: gdb support, fix pretty printing of channels.

The type to cast the elements to was stolen from a field
that's no longer there.
